objects.text:
• Active Noise Cancellation
• 70 Hours Playtime
• Premium Sound Quality
• Lightweight Design

product_details.description: 1, 【Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) ,Transparent Mode】: Professional advanced noise cancellation silences up to 95% of machine noise. Transparent Mode This feature lets in ambient noise, so you can easily hear announcements on a bus or subway, or listen to what's happening around you without removing the active noise cancelling headphones. The sensitive buttons control makes it easy to switch between this two modes. 2,【Up to 70 hours of playtime, Fast charging】: Enjoy up to 45 hours of music in noise cancelling mode, or extend the playtime to 70 hours in standard mode. A quick 5-minute charge gives you 4 hours of listening. You can charge it through the Type-C port, or use a 3.5mm audio cable for a wired connection.Note: If you are not using the over-ear wireless headphones in Bluetooth mode, please turn off ANC to conserve power. 3,【Premium sound quality, Deep Bass】: The 45mm drivers reproduce a full range of frequencies, providing deep, powerful, and immersive sound at any volume. BERIBES headphones wireless buetooth have always been committed to providing our customers with better sound quality as the focal point of our engineering. Our goal is to provide our customers with the best possible sound quality. 4,【Unique foldable, Lightweight, Ergonomic design】: The professional-grade protein ear-pads, 90° inward rotation, and 120°inward folding ear-cups are lightweight (only 0.8 lb) for maximum comfort during long periods of use. The bluetooth headphones with microphone fold compactly for easy storage when traveling. The ergonomic structure and multi-level adjustable headband provide a comfortable fit for all users. 5,【Bluetooth headset , After Sale Protection】: Package includes ANC Noise Cancellation Bluetooth headphones,3.5mm backup audio cable, USB charging cable, and User Manual. We will provide a 30-day return and 12-month warranty, lifetime worry-free user support, contact us anytime if you have any questions about the product, and we will reply within 10 hours Brand - BERIBES ** Color - Blue ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 32 Ohm **

banner_details:
This modern and clean banner design showcases a premium wireless headphone product. The visual layout splits into four quadrants with complementary blue shades, transitioning from deep navy (#3D5A80) to a lighter steel blue (#5D7797), with an overall grid structure providing technical precision. A large central image of headphones (referenced as `product_image`) dominates the right half, attracting immediate attention. The top left features a bold product title (`heading` and `subheading`), while a subtle tagline (`tagline`) adds a feature hook. Key product benefits are listed in bullet format (`description`) on the left, with the price (`price`) and a call-to-action button (`cta`, `cta_background`) below. The grid layout and fine white lines provide a tech-inspired aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: #3D5A80  
- Steel Blue: #5D7797  
- Ice Blue: #E0FBFC  
- Graphite Blue: #2B4670  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek pair of over-ear headphones in a sophisticated matte and metallic blue finish. The dominant color is a calming steel blue (#3F5B78), combined with touches of deep navy (#24364C) in the inner ear padding and logo text. A soft light blue sheen (#6A8AAE) is visible on the curved surfaces, offering a gentle gradient that enhances its premium look. The subtle blending between matte textures and satin highlights adds depth without overpowering the design. Ideal for an ad banner are this elegant blue palette, complemented by accents like cool gray (#AEB8C2) to maintain clarity and modernity.
